Detailed Description

Functions for XAUI initialization, configuration, and monitoring.

Function Documentation

int __cvmx_helper_xaui_configure_loopback ( int  ipd_port,
int  enable_internal,
int  enable_external 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure a port for internal and/or external loopback. Internal loopback causes packets sent by the port to be received by Octeon. External loopback causes packets received from the wire to sent out again.

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to loopback.
enable_internal Non zero if you want internal loopback
enable_external Non zero if you want external loopback
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure.
int __cvmx_helper_xaui_enable ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup and enable a XAUI interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD enabled but PKO disabled.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_xaui_enumerate ( int  xiface  ) 
cvmx_helper_link_info_t __cvmx_helper_xaui_link_get ( int  ipd_port  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Return the link state of an IPD/PKO port as returned by auto negotiation. The result of this function may not match Octeon's link config if auto negotiation has changed since the last call to cvmx_helper_link_set().

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to query
Returns:
Link state
int __cvmx_helper_xaui_link_init ( int  interface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup XAUI interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional.

Parameters:
interface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_xaui_link_set ( int  ipd_port,
cvmx_helper_link_info_t  link_info 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure an IPD/PKO port for the specified link state. This function does not influence auto negotiation at the PHY level. The passed link state must always match the link state returned by cvmx_helper_link_get(). It is normally best to use cvmx_helper_link_autoconf() instead.

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to configure
link_info The new link state
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_xaui_probe ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Probe a XAUI interface and determine the number of ports connected to it. The XAUI interface should still be down after this call.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to probe
Returns:
Number of ports on the interface. Zero to disable.
int cvmx_helper_xaui_link_reinit ( int  interface  ) 

Reinitialize XAUI interface.

Does a probe without changing the hardware state.

Parameters:
interface Interface to reinitialize
Returns:
0 on success, negative on failure
int cvmx_helper_xaui_link_retrain ( int  interface  ) 

Retrain XAUI interface.

GMX is disabled as part of retraining. While GMX is disabled, new recieved packets are dropped. If GMX was in the middle of recieving a packet when disabled, that packet will be recieved before GMX idles. Transmitted packets are buffered normally, but not sent. If GMX was in the middle of transmitting a packet when disabled, that packet will be transmitted before GMX idles.

Parameters:
interface Interface to retrain
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
